comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
This image (and others) have cropped up in the [http://www.flickr.com/photos/31575009@N05] as part of wonderful collections of NSW photos sent to the UK Colonial Office.  Their date for this particular series is 1876 - 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/nationalarchives/8187115617/in/set-72157632016722030/]
